cards.name: Crime Safety Alert
cards.text: A player of your choice loses 2 preparation and 0.1 GPA.

cards.name: Feared by Many
cards.text: Gain 30 money and 1 preparation for each Evil you have.

cards.name: Dumpster Diver
cards.text: Look at the last six cards in the discard pile. Pick up to two to exchange with cards from your hand.

cards.name: Shady Deal
cards.text: +3 Evil. Choose One: 70 money, +5 preparation, or +0.1 GPA.

cards.name: Robbery
cards.text: +5 Evil. Choose another player to pay you all but 5 of their Money, and all but 1 of their preparation. This card can be played on any space in place of an action card on your turn.

cards.name: Do Someone's Homework
cards.text: +2 prep. Choose a player. They get -20 money, +2 Evil.

cards.name: Pay Someone to Take Your Classes
cards.text: Lose all your money. +0.5 GPA. Skip your next 3 turns.
cards.flavor: "Who would be that retarted to misspell 'your'?"
